about.summary: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi files.

name: flake8-pyi
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "flake8-pyi" %}
{% set version = "19.3.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: 3646134dcc5269d3fd017624961de83cc0a0404f620233885ad86faf64265a11

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - attrs
    - flake8 >=3.2.1
    - pyflakes >=2.1.1

test:
  imports:
    - pyi

about:
  home: "https://github.com/ambv/flake8-pyi"
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi files."

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - xhochy
